name: Kov_Du_Derra
content:
Kov Du Derra is a male Duros who works as a bodyguard for the Ccalras Corporation representative Kollan Xa in Mos Eisley around the time of the Battle of Yavin. He wore white overalls with black boots and highlights.
Around that time, he and Xa "kidnapped" Beeyon Nace's lover Eila in order to blackmail the agent into reporting on customs patrols.
Kov Du Derra appears in West End Games' 1997 Mos Eisley Adventure Set.
